articles.title: Your pumpkin might be hiding a toxic secret

articles.title: This tiny bat hunts like a lion, but better
articles.description: Fringe-lipped bats from Panama hunt like miniature lions, using a “hang-and-wait” strategy to capture large, energy-rich prey.
